thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Joan

author: Joan
title: Joan
text: The address on my package was wrong blame it on the computer the county number for the road was placed on it automatically so my package was returned ! I had to trace the package make the call to Frames Direct to ask when they would be resent.This first time I was told I would have to call back on Wednesday and let them know my package address was wrong then they could change address and resend.So when I called back I was told they would be resent. I requested tracking number still no notafacation of when my glasses would be returned.On and on finally one month later I got the glasses.I wish could have given a better opinion but poor customer service has no excuses.
